title: Exit, Stage Right
author: verias
text:
So, our protagonists have now "escaped" the pod bay and are travelling down to find their client. Seems like all is well, minus the impending ship detonation.

Perhaps they should get a move on. The ship isn't all that small to begin with, but at least they seem to know where they're going.

Join us on Monday for the wrap up of this particular short story!

Keith W.

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Love the Lazer Tag target on "Sniper's" belt. (Sorry I haven't been on a lot lately, bit of a trail line of minor health glitches lately)
